name: SMP Finance
description: SMP Marketplace is an eCommerce platform. We offer products from many business groups that have joined us as partners by using SMP Bonus as a medium of payment on the platform. Items are compiled by category to facilitate the consumerâ€™s search for specific products. SMP Marketplace provides an avenue for convenient and secure payments which are verified through blockchain. The system connects to Wallet where the customer can pay automatically in just a few steps: Press to pay for the product, connect to the wallet, press to confirm the payment. Every transaction made through SMP Bonus will receive a SMP Bonus. The SMP Bonus Team is a diverse group of highly skilled developers and marketers. Our team has the knowledge and aptitude, along with a shared common vision in the company, to plan and coordinate resources as needed to achieve the highest levels of success. The mission of the SMP Bonus Team is to use unparalleled marketing execution, robust influencer connections and proven digital marketing strategies worldwide to turn $SMP Bonus into a powerhouse ready to serve its clients and its customers. One of the main disadvantages of traditional international money transfers is the high cost. Extra fees have made this form of money transfer less popular. At SMP Bonus we are a marketplace platform, a payment gateway platform, and a staking APY platform. Our team has selected Binance Smart Chain Built type BEP-20 tokens as the most stable network. This network guarantees superior speed and lower transaction costs.
